sentences.en: Gold toilets on a private jumbo jet is gauche. Giving to the community isn't.
sentences.cn: 私人喷气客机上的黄金马桶是值得羞愧的,但向社区捐赠则不是.

sentences.en: He now seems gauche and uninteresting.
It would be gauche to mention the price.
She was a rather gauche, provincial creature.
sentences.cn: 她是个非常不善交际、偏狭守旧的人。

sentences.en: Their excellent manners always made me feel gauche.
sentences.cn: 他们优雅的举止总是让我感到自己很笨拙.

sentences.en: Une dame aux cheveux blancs regarde à gauche et à droite. Elle a l'air d'attendre quelqu'un.
sentences.cn: 一位白发妇女左顾右盼,好像在等什么人.

sentences.en: We're all a bit gauche when we're young.
sentences.cn: 年轻的时候我们都有点放不开。

sentences.en: When receiving a business card, it is gauche to write on the back side.
sentences.cn: 当你接到一张名片时, 在名片的背面写字是一种无礼的表现.

words.tran_cn: 笨拙的；粗鲁的；不善交际的；偏转的

trans.tran_en: doing or saying wrong or impolite things, especially because you do not know the right way to behave
